description: Purple Bergenia (Bergenia purpurascens) is an amazing plant that is easy to grow and very decorative. It can tolerate a wide range of climates and is both drought and cold hardy. Its purple leaves start off as a deep shade of purple and turn a more vibrate, almost pinkish hue in the summer. Its pink-purple drainage near the end of the stem together with the purple color of its foliage makes it an eye-catching addition to any garden. This deciduous perennial grows low to the ground and produces bell-shaped flowers in the spring. It prefers partial to full shade and is relatively easy to care for. In summary, purple Bergenia is an ideal plant choice for both beauty and durability.
